name: AI-Blaster
description:
Prototype of 2D shooter game, based on short fights against a robot. The idea is that the first 6 rounds (Level I) the robot will attack you based on a pre-programmed rules (no AI).  If you succeed on beating the robot, this one will apply the previous experience in battle to learn an adapted behavior. After that in the next 6 rounds (Level I - red), you will fight the robot with real AI. This cycle will be repeated again in Leve II, with a preprogrammed behavior (with a quicker robot) and then again in Level II-red, the robot will adapt in order to beat you. Take into account that there is a remaining time counter (on the top-left screen) that if reaches 0, automatically this means a Game Over, although there is plenty of time in trying to beat the robot.

Controls:

      W (move up)  -  A (move left) -  S (move down)   -  D (move right)

    Arrow up (shoot)

     Left Arrow (rotate Counter-Clockwise)

     Right Arrow (rotate Clockwise)           

Game Design & Programming + Sprite Designs:

     https://bl4ckrose.itch.io/

Background Space Image:

     https://norma-2d.itch.io/

Instructions:

     Download the compressed file, extract the files and then run  "ai_blaster.exe".
